automaton.approvalNotes:
Defect:15502 Reason: commands still timing out. ==== Defect Devops:14858 Reason: 1) Determine Ticket Handler -> due to args not set with right thing 2) command time out - will increase soft time out to 30 seconds 3) -more- option received -> as term len 0 command auth failed. Date:3May2017
Release:26-Devops:36518 GSA Link: https://bglgsa.ibm.com/projects/a/ap_automation_team/ASEAN/ThanachartBank_TBK/sign-off/Release%2026-Network/
automaton.name: TBK:NTW:CIS:CUS:D:C:EVT:1.0:Port Security Violation Component
automaton.notes: -Login to device and determine status of port. -If port is shutdown with auto recovery enabled, wait 2 iterations of recovery interval. and then escalate..

EditVariableAction.script: component_output="Could not collect information from device as the commands did not retrieve output back to ipcenter"; component_output;

NoopState.name: Where To Now?
NoopState.notes: Now we have mac-address-table, do we wait for recovery?

NormalState.name: show log
NormalState.notes: std cmd: sh log | i PORT_SECURITY-SPSTBY-2-PSECURE_VIOLATION

Transition.name: No Wait - Recovery Not Detected OR Wait 2 iterations complete
